00036 typedef struct
00037 {
00038 
00039 #if defined( CRIPPLED_VERSION ) || defined( RUSSIAN )
00040       UINT8       ubIdentifier[4];
00041 #endif
00042 
00043       UINT16      fFlags;
00044 
00045       // conditions
00046       union
00047       {
00048             INT16       sRequiredItem;                // item NPC must have to say quote
00049             INT16       sRequiredGridno;        // location for NPC req'd to say quote
00050       };
00051       UINT16      usFactMustBeTrue;       // ...before saying quote
00052       UINT16      usFactMustBeFalse;      // ...before saying quote
00053       UINT8       ubQuest;                                  // quest must be current to say quote
00054       UINT8       ubFirstDay;                         // first day quote can be said
00055       UINT8       ubLastDay;                          // last day quote can be said
00056       UINT8       ubApproachRequired;     // must use this approach to generate quote
00057       UINT8       ubOpinionRequired;      // opinion needed for this quote     13 bytes
00058 
00059       // quote to say (if any)
00060       UINT8       ubQuoteNum;                         // this is the quote to say
00061       UINT8       ubNumQuotes;                        // total # of quotes to say          15 bytes
00062 
00063       // actions
00064       UINT8       ubStartQuest;
00065       UINT8       ubEndQuest;
00066       UINT8       ubTriggerNPC;
00067       UINT8       ubTriggerNPCRec;
00068       UINT8       ubFiller;                     //                                       20 bytes
00069       UINT16      usSetFactTrue;
00070       UINT16      usGiftItem;             // item NPC gives to merc after saying quote
00071       UINT16      usGoToGridno;
00072       INT16       sActionData;            // special action value 
00073

00076 #endif
00077 
00078 } NPCQuoteInfo;                                                                                                                                                   // 32 bytes
